pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generating and Fitting K-Inflated 'discrete gamlss.family' Distributions // This is an add on package to 'GAMLSS'. The main purpose of this package is generating and fitting inflated distributions at any desired point (0, 1, 2, ...). The function gen.Kinf() generates K-inflated version of an existing discrete 'GAMLSS' family distribution.
